basic.blooming: Foliage plants, sometimes flowers, spathe flowers
basic.color: Leaf color green, flower color pale yellow, brown or cinnamon

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes half shade, may take 3-4h moderate sunlight
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly after soil surface dries, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, yellowing and diseased leaves timely
